description: Awarded the Best New Food Truck Of Las Vegas in 2013 and ranked #1 on Best Of Las Vegas 2014 Dragon Grille has become one of the most acclaimed Food Trucks in the valley. We specialize in Modern Asian Fusion from delicious Beef Brisket Bowls/Tacos to delectable Bulgogi Philly Cheesesteak and Wagyu Beef Sliders,  this truck's dishes are sure to please and entice. So head on over and check out Dragon Grille today!
name: Dragon Grille
